name: dolly and bb will not wake up anymore
name_en: Dolly and BB Will Not Wake Up Anymore
lyrics:
Dolly my little dog
Fur in black and brown
She met her boyfriend Rocky
They played in the ground
One winter night
A baby dog was born
Unfortunately
Dolly died next morning
I cried in the morning

BB the baby dog
Lost her mother Dolly
Thus we fed her
Pretend to be her mother
BB grew up
And had babies
Maybe that's fate
One day the wolf dog bit her
The wolf dog bit her

The wolf dog bit her neck
And BB couldn't breathe
She's puling on the floor
Her blood sketched on her chin
Her son's watching and barking
He was too small to do fighting
I didn't save my darling
I was sleeping

Dolly my little dog
Fur in black and brown
She met her boyfriend Rocky
They played in the ground
One winter night
A baby dog was born
Her name is BB
Her name is BB
Her name is BB

album.slug: 我們在炎熱與抑鬱的夏天-無法停止抽煙-qqPhcd
album.name: 我們在炎熱與抑鬱的夏天，無法停止抽煙
album.name_en: We Can't Stop Smoking in the Vicious and Blue Summer
